title: Bethelhem ni bwi Goaliao
lyrics:
Bethelhem ni bwi Goaliao
Jisu  Gotho khou  fwi khulumni
‘Okhwrangao mohima jathwng
Be buhumao Shanti jathwng’ -2
(A)
Menda laokhar fwra rongjaswng
Rongja nanwi biswr mwsaglangdwng
Halleluiya O Halleluiya . . . .
(B)
Jwngni mondoliao sarifwidw
Jwngni nokhoraobw sarifwidw
Halleluiya O Halleluiya . . . .
